1.question: After she ............... the body of her husband, the police asked her to collect his personal things.
1.full_text:
After she ............... the body of her husband, the police asked her to collect his personal things.

Options:
A) had identified
B) has identified
C) was identified
D) was identifying
1.solution:
ترجمه: چون نقاشی ارتباط بسیار نزدیکی با روابط میان افراد دارد، احتمالاً قدیمی ترین شکل هنری است که به وجود آمده است.
نکته: چون در این تست نقاشی را با تمام هنرهای دیگر مقایسه می کنیم، صفت برترین جواب این تست است.

2.question: In some species of fish, the male, not the female, does the task of ..................... .
2.full_text:
In some species of fish, the male, not the female, does the task of ..................... .

Options:
A) for caring the young
B) the young for caring
C) caring for the young
D) the caring young for
2.solution:
ترجمه: در ۲۶ آگوست، او به آزمایشگاهش برگشت و روز بعد آن آزمایشاتش راجع به لامپ الکتریکی اش را شروع کرد.
۱) نسل ها

3.question: Most of the suggestions ............... were made at the meeting were not very helpful.
3.full_text:
Most of the suggestions ............... were made at the meeting were not very helpful.

Options:
A) as
B) they
C) which
D) which they
3.solution:
۲) آزمایشات
۴) اختراعات
۳) ترکیبات
ترجمه: آن مغازه همچنین کارهای هنری مانند: سفال، شیشه و وسایل تزئینی خانگی که توسط بیش از ۸۰ هنرمند ساخته شده است را
می فروشد.
۱) سفال

4.question: Because drawing was so closely related to communication, it was probably .................. art form to develop.
4.full_text:
Because drawing was so closely related to communication, it was probably .................. art form to develop.

Options:
A) early
B) earlier
C) as early
D) the earliest
4.solution:
۲) گنج
۳) محصول
ترجمه: به منظور یافتن ایدهٔ نابی برای باغچهٔ خودت چه راهی بهتر از اینکه باغچه دیگران را ببینی؟
۱) راه حل

5.question: On August 26, he returned to his laboratory and the following day began his .................. on his electric light bulb.
5.full_text:
On August 26, he returned to his laboratory and the following day began his .................. on his electric light bulb.

Options:
A) generations
B) experiments
C) combinations
D) inventions
5.solution:
۲) الهام، ایدهٔ ناب
۳) تجربه
۴) ابزار، اسباب
۴) تصور
ترجمه: رئیس آتش نشانی از تیمش دفاع کرد و گفت که آن ها نهایت تلاش شان را کردند تا جان آن دختر را نجات دهند.
۱) دفاع کردن

6.question: The shop also sells artwork like ....................., glass and home decor made by over 80 artists.
6.full_text:
The shop also sells artwork like ....................., glass and home decor made by over 80 artists.

Options:
A) pottery
B) treasure
C) crops
D) tools
6.solution:
۲) مصرف کردن
۳) هشدار دادن
۴) انتقال دادن
ترجمه: آیتم های منوی رستوران از غذاهای چینی مانند هات پات و دامپلینگز تا انواع پاستای ایتالیایی مِتغیرِ است.
۱) متغیر بودن

7.question: What better way of finding .................... for your own garden than by visiting others.
7.full_text:
What better way of finding .................... for your own garden than by visiting others.

Options:
A) solution
B) inspriration
C) experience
D) imagination
7.solution:
۲) انتخاب کردن
۳) توسعه دادن، گسترش دادن
ترجمه: خیلی از والدین احساس می کنند که می توانند در خانه آموزش مناسب تری ارائه دهند.
۱) صادق

8.question: The Fire Chief ................. his team and said that they had done everything possible to save the girl's life.
8.full_text:
The Fire Chief ................. his team and said that they had done everything possible to save the girl's life.

Options:
A) defended
B) consumed
C) warned
D) transmitted
8.solution:
۲) جسمی
۳) مناسب
۴) تولید کردن
۴) تکراری
ترجمه: چیزی که مدارس در مورد یک موضوع خاص و در یک سطح مشخص آموزش می دهند هنوز هم به شکل گسترده ایِ در میان ایالات و
کشورها متغیر است.
۱) به طور ناگهانی

9.question: Items on the menu ................. from chinese food like hotpot and dumplings to Italian pasta dishes.
9.full_text:
Items on the menu ................. from chinese food like hotpot and dumplings to Italian pasta dishes.

Options:
A) range
B) choose
C) expand
D) generate
9.solution:
۲) در حقیقت
۳) به طور کم کم، تدریجی
۴) به طور گسترده
ترجمه: "اِد" بیشتر رفیق هایش را در باشگاه دید. الآن هفته ای یک بار آن ها جمع می شوند و با دوچرخه سواری در اطراف شهر با هم تمرین
می کنند، همان طور که ضرب المثل داریم کبوتر با کبوتر، باز با باز.
۱) کار نیکو کردن از پر کردن است.
۲) باد آورده را باد می برد.
۳) کبوتر با کبوتر، باز با باز
۴) دو فکر بهتر از یک فکر است. (هر سری عقلی دارد. )
----------
ا ترجمهٔ :Cloze Test
وقتی که شما قرار است در رابطه با یک کتاب صحبت کنید لازم است که به دقت برای انجام آن آماده شوید. ابتدا باید کتابی را انتخاب
کنید که از خواندن آن لذت ببرید و آن را خوب درک کنید. شما صحبت بهتری خواهید داشت اگر در رابطه با آنچه که صحبت می کنید
احساس راحتی کنید. بعد از این که شما کتاب را انتخاب کردید در رابطه با آنچه می خواهید بگویید نکته برداری کنید. از برگه های یادداشت
کوچک یا تکه های کاغذ استفاده کنید. سپس بر روی صحبت کردن از روی یادداشت ها تمرین کنید تا زمانی که بتوانید بدون خواندن
یادداشت ها و بدون مکث زیاد صحبت کنید. حال باید زمان بندی کنید تا مطمئن شوید که صحبت شما بیش از حد طولانی یا کوتاه نباشد. در
صورت لزوم سخن خود را تعدیل کنید تا به زمان بندی درستی برسید. در نهایت صحبت خود را با یک دوست تمرین کنید یا آن را ضبط کنید
تا بتوانید به آن گوش دهید.

10.question: Many parents feel that in some way they can offer a more ....................... education at home.
10.full_text:
Many parents feel that in some way they can offer a more ....................... education at home.

Options:
A) honest
B) physical
C) suitable
D) repeated
10.solution: توضیح: در این تست نیاز به یک حرف ربط داریم و چون فعل قبل گذشته است فعل بعدی نیز باید گذشته باشد.

11.question: What schools teach in a certain subject or at a particular grade level still varies .................. among states and countries.
11.full_text:
What schools teach in a certain subject or at a particular grade level still varies .................. among states and countries.

Options:
A) suddenly
B) actually
C) gradually
D) widely

12.question: Ed met most of his friends at the gym. Now once a week, they all meet up and exercise together by going for bike rides around the city. As the saying goes, ................... .

options.3: birds of a feather flock together
options.4: two heads are better than one

12.full_text:
Ed met most of his friends at the gym. Now once a week, they all meet up and exercise together by going for bike rides around the city. As the saying goes, ................... .

Options:
A) practicc makes perfecct
B) easy come, easy go
C) birds of a feather flock together
D) two heads are better than one
12.solution:
۲) داوطلبانه
۳) متمایز، برجسته
۴) راحت
توضیح: جمله ربطی به زمان گذشته ندارد زیرا در ادامهٔ آن زمان حال آمده است و این تست کاربرد زمان حال کامل است.

13.question:
When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (1) ..................
13.full_text:
When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (1) ..................

Options:
A) because you understood
B) and that you understood
C) or you should understand
D) which you should understand

14.question: Which is the best choice for the blank (2) ..................
14.full_text:
When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (2) ..................

Options:
A) renewable
B) voluntary
C) distinguished
D) comfortable
14.solution:
۲) دلیل
۳) مکث
توضیح: به دلیل وجود حرف ربط or عبارت بعد از آن باید با عبارت قبل از آن برابر باشد.
ا ترجمهٔ درک مطلب ۱:
۴) نکته
من یک هوادار واقعی برای تلاش برای (حفظ) محیط زیست هستم و این ماه موعد ساعت سالانهٔ زمین (بودجه بزرگ جهانی برای طبیعت)
است. ساعت زمین رویدادی است که شما لامپ ها و برق غیرضروری را بین ساعت ۸ تا ۹ شب خاموش می کنید و چیزهایی مثل تلویزیون،
کامپیوتر و وسیلهٔ بازی تان. هرچند، شما تنها در خانه در تاریکی برای یک ساعت نمی نشینید بلکه مردم در گروه هایی جمع می شوند و بدون
استفاده از برق خوش می گذرانند. کارهایی مثل رقصیدن، آتش بازی و برنامه های موسیقی محبوب هستند و شرکت در آن بسیار لذت بخش است.
بسیاری از افراد سرشناس در رویداد ساعت زمین شرکت می کنند و امسال بسیار مهم است چراکه دهمین سالگرد این برنامه است.
رویداد ساعت زمین تنها مربوط به صرفه جویی در مصرف برق نیست. افرادی که در این زمینه فعالیت دارند جنگلی را در اوگاندا کاشته اند،
صفحه های خورشیدی در هندوستان ساخته اند و قانونی را در آرژانتین برای حفاظت از دریا تصویب کرده اند.
من در ۵ سال اخیر هر ساله در رویداد ساعت زمین شرکت کرده ام و بخشی از فعّالیت های بسیاری در مدرسه و دانشگاه بوده ام. سال
گذشته، برای مثال دانشگاه من یک سینمای پدال زنی (دوچرخه ای) در محیط باز داشت. در سینمای پدال زنی (دوچرخه ای) ، تنها راه برای
ادامهٔ تماشای فیلم رکاب زدن دوچرخه تان است. اگر همه توقف کنند، صفحهٔ نمایش خاموش می شود! خوشبختانه تعداد ما آن قدر زیاد بود که
کمک می کرد تا تماشای فیلم ادامه پیدا کند و ما این کار را نوبتی انجام می دادیم. هرچند بیرون در شب بسیار سرد بود، امّا برای کسانی که
رکاب نمی زدند شکلات داغ و پتو داشتیم. هرکه آنجا بود، لذت بسیاری می برد.

15.question: Which is the best choice for the blank (3) ..................
15.full_text:
When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (3) ..................

Options:
A) decide that
B) had decided
C) are deciding
D) have decided
15.solution:
ترجمه: هدف اصلی نویسندهٔ این متن چیست؟
۱) معرفی یک رویداد خاص
۲) مقایسهٔ بعضی فعّالیت های سرگرم کننده
۳) پیدا کردن سرآغاز رویداد ساعت زمین
۴) توصیف کردن بعضی راه های صرفه جویی در انرژی

16.question: Which is the best choice for the blank (4) ..................
16.full_text:
When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (4) ..................

When you are going to give a book talk, you need to prepare it carefully. First, you should choose a book that you enjoyed (1) ............... well. You will give a better talk if you feel (2) .............. talking about it. After you (3) .................. on the book, make notes about what you want to say. Use small note cards or pieces of paper. Then practice talking from the notes until you can talk without reading the notes and without many (4) ................... . At this point, you should time yourself to make sure your talk is not too long or (5) .............. . If necessary, adjust your talk so that it takes the right amount of time. Finally, practice your talk with a friend or record it so you can listen to it.
Which is the best choice for the blank (4) ..................

Options:
A) definitions
B) reasons
C) pauses
D) tips
16.solution:
ترجمه: طبق متن مردمی که در ساعت زمین شرکت می کنند
۱) به طور خاص علاقه مند به محافظت کردن طبیعت در اوگاندا، هند و آرژانتین هستند.
۲) بین ساعت ۸ و ۹ شب نباید بیرون بمانند.
۳) از برق کمتری برای یک دورهٔ مشخص زمانی استفاده می کنند.
۴) تمام چراغ ها را برای یک ساعت خاموش می کنند.
توضیح: گزینهٔ ۴ به این دلیل غلط است که گفته تمام چراغ ها در صورتی که در متن گفته همهٔ چراغ های غیرضروری.
----------

17.question: Which is the best choice for the blank (5) ..................
17.full_text:
Which is the best choice for the blank (5) ..................

Options:
A) too short
B) as short
C) shorter than
D) the shortest
17.solution:
ترجمه: در متن اشاره می شود که در سینمای پدالی
۱) صفحهٔ نمایش چند دفعه خاموش شد.
۲) همه نمی دانستند که چگونه رکاب بزنند.
۳) نویسنده بایستی دوچرخه اش را بدون توقف رکاب می زد.
۴) سرما باعث نشد که کسی احساس ناراحتی کند.

18.question:
PASSAGE 1:
I am a big fan of trying to save the environment, and this month is the WWF (World Wide Fund for Nature) annual Earth Hour. Earth Hour is an event where you turn off all non-essential lights and power between 8-9 pm; things like your TV, computer and console. However, you do not just sit at home in the dark for an hour. Instead, people gather in groups and have fun without using power. Things like dancing, fireworks and musical performanecs are popular and it is very fun to take part.
Many celebrities also take part in Earth Hour and this year is very important as it is the tenth year of the projecet.Earth Hour is not just abaut saving energy; people involved in Earth have also planted a forest in Uganda, built solar panels in India and passed a law to protect the sea in Argentina.
I have taken part in Earth Hour every year for the last five years and I have been part of lost of activities at school and university. Last year, for example, my university had an outdoor eycle cinema. At the eycle cinema, the only way to keep watching the film is to keep pedaling your bike, if everyone stops, then the screen turns off! Luckily, there were many of us to help keep the movie going and we took turns. Although it was very cold outside at night, we had hot chocolate and blankets for the people who were not cycling Everyone who was there had a lot of fun.
According to the passage, what is the author's main purpose in the passage?

options.3: To traee the origin of Earth Hour
options.4: To describe some ways of saving energy

18.full_text:
PASSAGE 1:
I am a big fan of trying to save the environment, and this month is the WWF (World Wide Fund for Nature) annual Earth Hour. Earth Hour is an event where you turn off all non-essential lights and power between 8-9 pm; things like your TV, computer and console. However, you do not just sit at home in the dark for an hour. Instead, people gather in groups and have fun without using power. Things like dancing, fireworks and musical performanecs are popular and it is very fun to take part.
Many celebrities also take part in Earth Hour and this year is very important as it is the tenth year of the projecet.Earth Hour is not just abaut saving energy; people involved in Earth have also planted a forest in Uganda, built solar panels in India and passed a law to protect the sea in Argentina.
I have taken part in Earth Hour every year for the last five years and I have been part of lost of activities at school and university. Last year, for example, my university had an outdoor eycle cinema. At the eycle cinema, the only way to keep watching the film is to keep pedaling your bike, if everyone stops, then the screen turns off! Luckily, there were many of us to help keep the movie going and we took turns. Although it was very cold outside at night, we had hot chocolate and blankets for the people who were not cycling Everyone who was there had a lot of fun.
According to the passage, what is the author's main purpose in the passage?

Options:
A) To introduse a particular event
B) To compare some fun activities
C) To traee the origin of Earth Hour
D) To describe some ways of saving energy
18.solution:
کدام یک از گزینه های زیر بهترین توصیف را از گرایش نویسنده به ساعت زمین دارد؟
۱) آزرده خاطر
I ترجمهٔ درک مطلب ۲:
۲) نامطمئن
۳) متعجب
۴) سرگرم
چه تعداد سیاره در کهکشان ما وجود دارد؟ پاسخ گویی به این سوال سخت است. آیا سیارات دیگری هستند که در آن ها حیات وجود
داشته باشد؟ این دقیقاً همان چیزی است که ماموریت کپلر امید دارد که آن را کشف کند. ناسا تلسکوپ فضایی کپلر را که برای یافتن
سیارات قابل زندگی طراحی شده بود در سال ۲۰۰۹ به فضا پرتاب کرد. تاکنون این تلسکوپ پنج سیارهٔ جدید به اندازهٔ زمین در ماورای
منظومهٔ شمسی مان کشف کرده است. این سیارات گرم تر از زمین هستند و تا آنجا که می دانیم بسیار گرم تر از آن است که بتوان بر روی آن
زندگی کرد. تیم کپلر پیش بینی می کند که آن ها حدّاقل ۳ سال (و احتمالاً بیشتر) برای یافتن یک سیاره به مانند زمین وقت نیاز خواهند داشت.
ساده ترین ملزومات برای اینکه یک سیاره قابل زندگی باشد (زندگی بر اساس کربن، مانند زمین) این است که آنجا آب مایع (نه یخ زده یا گاز)
وجود داشته باشد. بنابراین فاصلهٔ سیاره از خورشید و در نتیجه دما مهم هستند. همچنین لازم است میزان مناسبی از هوا در آنجا وجود
داشته باشد. اگر یک سیاره به اندازهٔ مریخ (نصف اندازهٔ زمین) کوچک باشد، گرانش ضعیف آن به معنای آن خواهد بود که نمی تواند
دربردارندهٔ مولکول های هوا باشد. اگر یک سیاره به اندازهٔ نپتون (چهار برابر اندازهٔ زمین) باشد، گرانش بسیار قوی و هوای بیش از اندازه ای
دارد. بنابراین اندازه نیز مهم است.
هزینهٔ ماموریت تقریباً ششصد میلیون دلار است. طبق برنامه ریزی قرار است این تلسکوپ تا سال ۲۰۱۳ به مشاهدهٔ خود ادامه دهد امّا
این زمان می تواند تمدید شود. آیا ما ناراحت خواهیم شد اگر بفهمیم در کهکشانمان تنها هستیم یا خوشحال خواهیم شد اگر بفهمیم که
کهکشانمان را با گونه های دیگری از حیات شریک هستیم؟

19.question: According to the passage, people who take part in Earth Hour ................... .

options.1: are cspecially interested in protecting nature in Uganda, India and Argentina
options.2: must not stay away from home between 8 and 9 p.m
options.3: use less electricity for a certain period of time
options.4: turn off all lights for one hour

19.full_text:
PASSAGE 1:
I am a big fan of trying to save the environment, and this month is the WWF (World Wide Fund for Nature) annual Earth Hour. Earth Hour is an event where you turn off all non-essential lights and power between 8-9 pm; things like your TV, computer and console. However, you do not just sit at home in the dark for an hour. Instead, people gather in groups and have fun without using power. Things like dancing, fireworks and musical performanecs are popular and it is very fun to take part.
Many celebrities also take part in Earth Hour and this year is very important as it is the tenth year of the projecet.Earth Hour is not just abaut saving energy; people involved in Earth have also planted a forest in Uganda, built solar panels in India and passed a law to protect the sea in Argentina.
I have taken part in Earth Hour every year for the last five years and I have been part of lost of activities at school and university. Last year, for example, my university had an outdoor eycle cinema. At the eycle cinema, the only way to keep watching the film is to keep pedaling your bike, if everyone stops, then the screen turns off! Luckily, there were many of us to help keep the movie going and we took turns. Although it was very cold outside at night, we had hot chocolate and blankets for the people who were not cycling Everyone who was there had a lot of fun.
According to the passage, people who take part in Earth Hour ................... .

Options:
A) are cspecially interested in protecting nature in Uganda, India and Argentina
B) must not stay away from home between 8 and 9 p.m
C) use less electricity for a certain period of time
D) turn off all lights for one hour
19.solution:
ترجمه: عمدهٔ متن راجع به چه چیزی بحث می کند؟
۱) ویژگی های پنج سیارهٔ هم اندازهٔ زمین
۳) منظومهٔ شمسی ما و سیّارات آن
۲) تلاشی برای پیدا کردن سیارات مثل زمین
۴) درست کردن یک تلسکوپ فضایی

20.solution:
ترجمه: متن نشان می دهد که ماموریت کپلر .
۱) به وسیلهٔ یک ماموریت فضایی دیگر الهام گرفته شد.
) بعد از آن که شروع شد فوراً تمام نشد.

21.question: According to the passage, Which of the following best describes the author's attitude towards Earth Hour?
21.full_text:
PASSAGE 1:
I am a big fan of trying to save the environment, and this month is the WWF (World Wide Fund for Nature) annual Earth Hour. Earth Hour is an event where you turn off all non-essential lights and power between 8-9 pm; things like your TV, computer and console. However, you do not just sit at home in the dark for an hour. Instead, people gather in groups and have fun without using power. Things like dancing, fireworks and musical performanecs are popular and it is very fun to take part.
Many celebrities also take part in Earth Hour and this year is very important as it is the tenth year of the projecet.Earth Hour is not just abaut saving energy; people involved in Earth have also planted a forest in Uganda, built solar panels in India and passed a law to protect the sea in Argentina.
I have taken part in Earth Hour every year for the last five years and I have been part of lost of activities at school and university. Last year, for example, my university had an outdoor eycle cinema. At the eycle cinema, the only way to keep watching the film is to keep pedaling your bike, if everyone stops, then the screen turns off! Luckily, there were many of us to help keep the movie going and we took turns. Although it was very cold outside at night, we had hot chocolate and blankets for the people who were not cycling Everyone who was there had a lot of fun.
According to the passage, Which of the following best describes the author's attitude towards Earth Hour?

Options:
A) Annoyed
B) Uncertain
C) Surprised
D) Amused
21.solution:
،شی فرهنگی
ترجمه: کدام یک از گزینه های زیر بهترین توصیف را از عملکرد جملهٔ خط کشیده شدهٔ پاراگراف ۲ دارد؟
۱) یک موقعیتی را توصیف می کند که شرط ذکرشده در جملهٔ قبل را نمی تواند فراهم کند.
۲) تعریف لغتی که در جملهٔ قبل آن است را انجام می دهد.
۳) یک راه حل برای مشکل توصیف شده در جملهٔ قبل را فراهم می کند.
۴) از جملهٔ قبل یک نتیجه می گیرد.

22.question:
PASSAGE 2:
How many planets are there in our galaxy? That is a tricky question to answer. Are there other planets that support life? Tliat is exactly what the Kepler niission hopes to discover. NASA launched the Kepler space telescope, designed to lind habitable plancts, in 2009. So far it has discovered live new Earth-sized planets beyond our solar system. These planets are houler than the Carih - much too hot for life as we know it. The Kepler team predict that they will need at least three years (and possibly longer) to find an Earth-like planet.The simplest requirement for a planet to have life (carbon-based life like on Earth) is for there to be liquid water (not frozen or gas) so the distance from the planet's sun and therefore temperature are important. There also ineeds to be the correct amount of air. IC a planet is as small as Mars (half the size of Carth) its weak gravity means that it cannot hold on to air molecules. Il a planet is Neptunc sized (four times bigger than Earth) it has very strong gravity and 100 inuch air. So size matters too.The cost of the mission is approximately six hundred million dollars. It is scheduled to observe until 2013 but this could be extended. Will we be sad if we discover we are alone in our galaxy or happy if we find that we share it with other life forms?
According to the passage, What does the passage mainly discuss?

options.1: Features of five new Earth-sized planets
options.2: An endeavor to find Earth-like planets
options.3: Our solar system and its planets

22.full_text:
PASSAGE 2:

There also ineeds to be the correct amount of air. IC a planet is as small as Mars (half the size of Carth) its weak gravity means that it cannot hold on to air molecules. Il a planet is Neptunc sized (four times bigger than Earth) it has very strong gravity and 100 inuch air. So size matters too.The cost of the mission is approximately six hundred million dollars. It is scheduled to observe until 2013 but this could be extended. Will we be sad if we discover we are alone in our galaxy or happy if we find that we share it with other life forms?

A) Features of five new Earth-sized planets

25.question: There is enough information in the passage to answer which of the following questions?

options.3: What characteristies does a planet need to have in order to be able to support life?

There also ineeds to be the correct amount of air. IC a planet is as small as Mars (half the size of Carth) its weak gravity means that it cannot hold on to air molecules. Il a planet is Neptunc sized (four times bigger than Earth) it has very strong gravity and 100 inuch air. So size matters too.The cost of the mission is approximately six hundred million dollars.
